choices: Fast Shrinking
Fast Growth
Slow Shrinking
Slow Growth
Femdom
1.content: First thing's first: what type of story do you want?
1.title: Setting up the story

choices: The stern but caring doll, Shinku
The teasing tsundere doll, Suiseiseki
The bubbly and childish doll, HinaIchigo
The formerly evil doll, Suigintou
other
11.content:
It started out as a normal day for Jun. He was simply running around his house, doing his chores as he always did, and trying to ignore the bickering of the three living dolls who had come to live with him. Yes, things had finally returned to normal for Jun (or as close to normal as the life of a boy who lived with 3 magical dolls could be, anyway). It was hard to believe that, only three short months ago, these very dolls (along with 4 others) had waged an intense battle against each other for the title of 'Alice', the one perfect doll.

These 7 Rozen Maiden dolls engaged each other in a life-or-death battle, each seeking to claim the other's Rosa Mystica, the very source of these dolls' life. One by one, each of them fell to one another until only two remained; Shinku and the mysterious seventh doll Barasuishou. As these two battled it out, there was no clear sign of who would come out on top. In the end however, just as Shinku had gained the upper hand and was about to put an end to the infernal battle, an intervention by Jun gave Barasuishou the opening she needed to claim victory.

With Shinku defeated by this desperate attack, Barasuishou had claimed all the Rosa Mysticae from the other dolls. However, by an unexpected twist of fate, it was revealed that she wasn't a true Rozen Maiden doll herself. Being only a replica, she was unable to control the immense power of the Rosa Mysticae. The Alice Game ended as Barasuishou self destructed, and all of the dolls who were defeated by her were allowed to come back to life. It was a difficult time for all of them, yet despite the tears that had been shed during the Alice Game, life had slowly drifted back to the way it once was.

Soon after the Alice Game had ended, the true seventh doll made herself known to the others as Kirakishou. In a show of good will to thank them for vanquishing her impersonator, Kirakishou returned the final two Rosa Mysticae to Shinku, allowing her to resurrect the only two dolls who were defeated by someone other than Barasuishou. With Souseiseki and HinaIchigo back to normal, it was as if the entire Alice Game had never happened. Yet there was one good thing that did come out of the dreadful war; after their final battle, Shinku and Suigintou had set their long-standing hatred for each other aside. With this truce between the two, Suigintou eventually came to befriend her sister dolls as well.

Suigintou and Kirakishou now came to visit Jun's house just as often as Souseiseki and Kanaria, and the daily life of the young boy was finally in relative peace once again. As crazy as his life had become since first meeting with Shinku, he couldn't deny that he enjoyed having the Rozen Maidens in his life. In fact, if it weren't for them, then he probably would have never even set foot outside his own home (but that's a whole other story). The dolls had definitely added more to his life than they had taken away. It may be an abnormal life that he was now living, but he had gotten used to it.

Jun went about his daily business the same as always today, never suspecting that something would once again throw his peaceful life into chaos. Something even more bizarre mysterious than even the Alice Game had been.

As Jun was busy cleaning up the house, he heard the sound of someone ringing the doorbell. He immediately called out to Shinku.

"Shinku! I'm right in the middle of cleaning. Can you get that for me?"

"I would Jun, but I have some problems of my own to deal with at the moment! Knock it off you two!"

Jun looked over to see Shinku trying to sort out another argument between Suiseiseki and HinaIchigo. Jun simply sighed.

"Ugh... It's probably just Kirakishou again... Well, at least she has the courtesy to actually ring the doorbell. Suigintou just teleports in through the mirror, Souseiseki flies straight through my bedroom window even if it isn't open, and Kanaria seems to just show up in my back yard out of nowhere... I swear, these dolls are more trouble than they're worth..."

As he was ranting, the person at the door rang the bell again. Jun immediately set down his cleaning equipment and walked over to the door.

"Coming!"

When he reached the door and opened it, he looked around to see that there was nobody in sight.

"That's weird... I wonder who could have rung the doorbell..."

Just then, Jun noticed a small brown parcel at his feet. Curious, he picked it up.

"What the heck is this thing? I don't remember ordering anything off the internet lately. Ugh... I bet it was Shinku. Knowing her, it's probably some more Detective Kun-kun merchandise or something... Well, whatever. If she's gonna order stuff without my permission, then I'm sure she won't mind if I take a look inside..."

Jun then took the lid off of the box and peeked inside. Much to his surprise, a cloud of strange purple gas blasted out into his face. He immediately dropped the gas box and stumbled backwards, coughing.

"What the *cough* heck was that?! *cough* If that was her idea *cough* of a prank, then I'll *cough* be sure to give her a piece of my *cough* mind!"

Just then, Jun realized something strange. His head was barely as high as the doorknob, and he was getting smaller by the second! Jun began to panic as he realized that he was shrinking, but there wasn't anything he could do about it. He continued to get smaller and smaller until he was only a pathetic 3 inches tall! Suddenly, Jun heard a thud from behind him, followed by another, and another. He quickly realized that these thuds were coming in a regular pattern; they were footsteps! Turning to the source of the sound, Jun stared upward to see the face of ______________ looking right at him!
11.title: Jun's SMALL problem...

choices: "I don't like your tone, Jun. I think I'll show you what being a doll is like!"
"Alright Jun, calm down. I was only joking... Don't worry, I'll help you."
"I really don't think that this is my problem. I'll just let Nori handle this."
111.content:
Jun breathed a sigh of relief as he saw that Shinku was the one who approached him. Out of all the Rozen Maiden dolls, she was the first one he had encountered. As such, she was the one that he had the strongest bond with. The two had become close friends over their time together, and although Shinku herself was a bit hesitant to open up about her emotions, she still had come to trust Jun as both her medium and her friend.

Shinku now towered over him with a look of surprise on her face. The crimson-clothed doll then reached down to pick him up. Seeing her massive hand moving toward him, Jun suddenly began to worry about just what she would do with him. He quickly pushed these worries aside, however, as he remembered all the times that Shinku had saved his life during their time together. Jun simply stood and allowed the doll's large fingers to wrap around his body. Lifting him up to her face, Shinku began to speak.

"Jun? Is that you?"

"Yes Shinku! It's me!"

"Well, what exactly happened to you? How did you get so small?"

"I really don't know what the heck happened! When I opened the door, there was nobody in sight. Then I saw this weird box on the porch, and when I opened it, I got sprayed with some kind of powder. I think that you can see the results for yourself..."

"Oh my, well this could be a difficult case to solve... You're so tiny, you almost look like..."

Shinku paused as she placed her free hand over her mouth and began to giggle. Jun himself didn't see what was so funny about this situation.

"What? What do I look like that's so funny?!"

"You look just like a doll now, Jun!"

"WHAT?! Listen Shinku, you're the doll, not me! Come on, you have to help me get back to normal!"


How will Shinku respond to this?
111.title: Shinku's shrunken medium...

choices: "Introducing the other Rozen Maidens to the new you."
"Playing a little game together."
"Having you give me a relaxing massage."
1111.content:
Shinku began to look irritated as Jun yelled at her.

"I don't like your tone, Jun. You think that it's easy being a doll? Well then, let's just see how much you like it!"

Jun began to get worried. He could tell that he had probably crossed into forbidden territory with that last comment, and it was clear that Shinku was annoyed with him now.

"W-what do you mean by that?" Jun said nervously.

Shinku simply smirked at him.

"Well Jun, to put it bluntly, you'll be spending the day as my doll to teach you what being a doll is really like."

"But-"

Jun was cut off as Shinku covered his mouth with her index finger.

"No 'but's, Jun. You need to learn a lesson, and I'm going to give it to you. Now don't worry too much; I promise that I won't hurt you, so just think of this as a learning experience. Maybe after today, you'll understand more about what it's like to be a doll."

Shinku then removed her finger from his mouth, and Jun simply sighed. As demeaning as this situation was, he knew that he had no choice in the matter. Besides, he trusted Shinku when she said she wouldn't hurt him. Reluctantly, Jun resigned himself to spending the day as Shinku's doll.

"Alright Shinku, you win... Just be careful, alright?"

"But of course, Jun. You are my medium, after all. I would never let anything happen to you!"

Shinku then smiled and anounced what they would be doing first.

"Okay Jun, let's get started. The first thing we will be doing today is..."
1111.title: A day as Shinku's doll

choices: "If you tell me what to do, then I'll handle it."
"I guess we could start in the library instead."
"Maybe we should just try something else then." (readers choice)
1112.content:
Shinku just giggled again.

"Alright Jun, calm down. I was only joking... Don't worry, I'm going to help you now."

With a touch that was surprisingly gentle, Shinku carried Jun in her hands towards his bedroom. They needed someplace private where they could discuss the situation. Looking down to her palm and seeing a slightly worried expression on Jun's face, Shinku decided to try and reassure him that everything would be okay.

"It's all right Jun, there's bound to be a way to reverse something like this. After all, if it can be done it can also be undone."

"Do you really think so?" Jun asked.

It wasn't that he doubted what Shinku said (she sounded too confident for that) but he was just so nervous about being put into this situation. Shinku simply smiled at him tenderly as she responded.

"Naturally. You just calm down and we'll get this whole mess sorted out. I can't have my medium running around looking like that, now can I?" She said, her smile turning to a playful grin as she looked down at him. Jun found himself laughing in spite of himself; perhaps this wouldn’t be so bad after all.

It had been decided a while back that a practical investment in stepladders should be made so as to allow the dolls to open door easily and simply without having to resort to carrying an umbrella with them everywhere. With practiced steps, Shinku opened the door to Jun’s room and shut it behind her.

They settled on his bed, Jun sat in Shinku’s lap, the folds of her red dress like the waves in an ocean of blood… He quickly banished that mental image – to many disturbing possibilities. Jun had always hated having to look up at anyone, and now he was staring up at the colossal face of a doll.

This was… there was no other word but unbearable, he had to do something about it anything.

“What do you think I, er… we should do Shinku?”

“I think that it would be best if you were to start looking on that intraweb thing for any information that might be useful.”

“It’s internet Shinku, and that’s probably a good idea. If anyone’s ever seen something like this before, then I'm sure it’ll be online somewhere.” The bright smile soon fell from his face however. “Shinku?”

“Yes, Jun.”

“I can’t use a computer at this size, at all.”

“Oh… well…"
1112.title: And They Laughed at a Boy With Dolls

choices: "Don't worry Jun, I'll help you out. After all, that's what big sisters do!"
"Aw.... But can't we have some fun first? I promise I'll take good care of you!"
"Alright Jun, but I want you to do something nice for me first."
1113.content:
Thinking it over for a minute, Shinku placed Jun back on the floor and sighed.

"I don't have time to deal with this little problem of yours, Jun. I've already got my hands full keeping Suiseiseki and HinaIchigo from fighting all the time. And since this really doesn't have anything to do with me, I think that Nori would be more than happy to handle it."

She then walked away, leaving Jun alone on the floor once again. For a few minutes, he was simply standing there and waiting for Shinku's return. After a while, he heard footsteps again and saw Shinku had come back with his sister in tow. Shinku pointed at him and looked up at Nori.

"See! I told you! Jun went and got himself shrunken, so you'll have to take care of him for a while."

"Wow Shinku, you're right! I thought you were just joking about Jun shrinking!"

"Yes, well if you'll excuse me, I have more pressing business to attend to..."

Shinku then walked back to the living room, where Suiseiseki and Hina were having another one of their pointless arguments. Jun simply looked up at his massive sister, who smiled down at him before carefully picking him up off the ground.

"Oh Jun, you look so cute like this!" she cooed.

"Nori, this is serious! You can't honestly tell me that you're okay with me being the size of a doll!" Jun said, irritated.

"No offense Jun, but I think that even the dolls are a fair bit bigger than you are right now."

"That's not the point! Come on, sis! You've got to help me get back to normal!"


How will Nori respond?
1113.title: In his sister's hands

choices: "We play a little game together!"
"You massage my feet for a while!"
Before they continue, Souseiseki comes flying through Jun's window in her case!
112.content:
As the tiny Jun looked up, he saw a surprised Suiseiseki staring right at him. Panicking, Jun immediately tried to run from the massive doll. Suiseiseki noticed this, and swiftly reached down to pluck him off the ground. Holding the shrunken boy in the palm of her hand, Suiseiseki couldn't help but giggle.

"Oh wow... It looks like the puny human is REALLY puny now! This is so perfect!"

Jun began to get nervous as the huge doll now held him helplessly in her hand.

"Suiseiseki, this isn't funny! I want you to put me back down right now!"

"Really? And why should I? Give me one reason why I should have to listen to you!"

"Because... Ummm... Because..."

"Exactly! In case you hadn't noticed, I'm a lot bigger than you are now! So here's how things are going to work out, puny human; I'm getting sick of you spending all your time paying attention to Shinku! You're supposed to be my medium too, so I think that it's about time for you to give me some notice for once! Until I say otherwise, you belong to me Jun!"

Suiseiseki then proceeded to stuff Jun into the front of her dress before running up the stairs to his room. Pulling over a chair to stand on, she locked the door and laid down on Jun's bed. She then reached into the front of her dress and pulled Jun out again before placing him down on top of her stomach. Jun was angry, and immediately yelled at the colossal doll for what she did.

"What the heck were you thinking, you perverted doll!? Do you have any idea how stuffy it is in there?!"

"Oh pipe down, puny human! I couldn't just carry you, could I? What if somebody else saw you in my hands! I can't help it if this dress doesn't have any pockets! Now, get ready Jun, 'cause you're gonna be making up for all the attention you gave Shinku but not me! To start things off, how about..."
112.title: You belong to me now, Jun! Desu...

choices: He makes it to the top! HE WINS!!
Time's up! He loses!
Jun decides 'Screw this' and makes a break for it!
1121.content:
"What kind of gaaaaaaaaaeeeEEEH?" Jun shuddered before he could finish that sentence because the look on his doll mistress's face made him a little pale.

Her red and green dual-colored eyes widened with anticipation as a rather deviously cute smirk appeared across the Jade doll's face... Jun got a little nervous as he felt the grip of Suiseiseki's hands tighten around his small puny human body. For a brief moment, Suiseiseki was an excited playful little girl overly joyous about her brand new dolly she got for her birthday... too bad that brief moment quickly vanished as Jun had realized he was gonna be treated far worse than a doll. FAR far worse.

With a quick motion and a quick fuck you to the laws of gravity, the doll zipped up and stood back on her feet, still clenching her mini-Jun tightly in her grasp!

"Alrighty, pint-size!" she shouted anxiously, "ready for the first game of the day?!"
"FIRST game of the day?!"
"I'll take that as a yes!" she grinned right before purposely dropping the poor kid right in front of her feet!

The creepy little doll with a big mouth towered over him as her red eye glowed with keen interest. Once again, Jun was reduced to putty at the sight of the eerie glow that matches the eerie grin! If looks could kill, he'd be strung up over a bridge by his own intestinal chord!

"The name of this game is called 'Scaling Mt. Suiseiseki'!" she announced, "the rules of this game are so simple even a stupid puny human like you can understand them, yes?"
Not really having much of a choice, Jun sighed and asked, "How do I play 'Scaling Mt. Suiseiseki'?"
"Easy. All you gotta do is climb to the top of my head before time runs out! No problem, yes?"

Jun stared for a few seconds trying to contemplate this simplistic game before squinted his eyes! "W....wait a minute! I have to climb all the way up your huge creepy hollow body and reach the top of your head?!"
Suiseiseki gave a smug grin and nodded!
"FORGET IT! Keep your weirdo fantasies to yourself!"

"...what if I told you I might consider growing you back if you win?"

Jun practically did a double-take after hearing what she just said. "G...grow me back? You know how to grow me back?!"

"Uhhh.....sure!" Suiseiseki was OBVIOUSLY telling the truth cuz we all know she's NEVER the type to lie... "If you win this game, you'll be one step closer to winning your not-as-puny-as-you-are-now-but-still-pretty-damn-puny size back!" Even though he didnt know exactly how many steps it'll take to get his size back, Jun couldnt turn down such an offer. All he'd have to do is scale the dual-eyed bratty toy and he's in! No sweat, right?

"Alright, fine! I'll do it!"

"HOWEVER..." unfortunately for our little hero, Suiseiseki wasnt done, "if... no, WHEN you fail to reach the top of me before time runs out, we're gonna play ANOTHER little game."
Jun swallowed hard, "...What game?"
"Let's just say it's an 'educational' game," she replied with a devious smirk as the jade & ruby glowed, "...one that involves a thorough examination of the human anatomy! ....Yes?"

That odd threat left Jun speechless. Lord only knew what kind of disturbing 'educational' game Suiseiseki was talking about, but it's not like Jun was in any hurry to find out! He's gonna have to play to win!

"READY SET GO!"

Jun charged like his life depended on it, grabbed tightly to the folds of the doll's dress trying especially hard not to inadvertently touch any girly parts... not like she had any (at least I THINK she doesnt!) and climbed up the the sky high dress as Suiseiseki snickered at his desperate attempt to scale her.

Just then, an idea to make the game more interesting flashed in the crazy doll's mind!

"...Did I forget to mention... that Mt. Suiseiseki is incredibly prone to...EARTHQUAKES?!" she shouted just before shaking her dress a lot!

"Wha...wwha...wwhaaa..." Jun clung on to the fabric for dear life!

"....WAAAAAHH-OOF!!" and failed. All that effort put into climbing up her was now wasted. "Hey! No fair! You never said you were-"
"Clock's still ticking, tiny!"
"OH CRAP!" Remembering there was still a timer (even though he didnt how much time there was in the first place!), Jun quickly rethought his strategy... and attempted to climb up Suiseiseki's long wavy hair!

"Yah!"
"Wwaaaa-ugh!" but with a quick jerk of her head, Jun was sent flying back!

"C'mon, twerp!" she egged him on, "only the few and the proud have ever scaled Mt. Suiseiseki and survived!" She pounded her chest, "Put some heart into it, yes?!"

"Shut up," Jun mumbled as he tried again to climb up her dress.

*Flick!*
"AAAHH!!"

And immediately got flicked off! As Jun lied flat on his face, the cheating mountain frowned down at him and put her hands to her hips!

"Tsk tsk." Suiseiseki shook her head, "Pathetic. I always thought my medium had a lot more spine than this..."
Jun gritted his teeth from hearing that crazed doll belittle him. But for the possibility of getting his size back, he would have to endure and win this game!

Question is... despite all of Suiseiki's last minute changes to the rules... can Jun still win?
1121.title: I aint saying the stupid D-word! You cant make me!

choices: She tells the truth and admits that she has no idea how to return him to normal.
She continues with her charade and makes up another 'trial' to fix Jun's size.
11211.content:
Just then, Jun had an idea. They were standing on his bed, which was right next to his bedroom window. If he climbed up the curtains, then he could jump straight onto her head from the top of the window frame! It might be a dirty strategy, but Suiseiseki wasn't exactly playing fair either. If he wanted to win her little game, then this was his only chance. Running past Suiseiseki, Jun grabbed on to the curtains and began to climb. Suiseiseki simply watched him, confused.

"What the heck are you doing, puny human? You're supposed to be climbing ME, not the window!"

Jun just ignored her and continued climbing. It took him a while, but he finally managed to reach the top of the window frame. Looking down at Suiseiseki from up there, Jun realized just how high up he really was. If he missed his target and didn't land on the doll's head, he could seriously end up injuring himself. Putting these fears aside for the moment, Jun focused on his goal.

In one swift movement, he lept from the window frame and flew toward Suiseiseki's head. It took her a moment, but she quickly figured out just what Jun was planning on. Suiseiseki quickly attempted to move out of the way, but she wasn't quick enough. Jun safely landed on top of her head, and now stood triumphantly amidst the doll's long brown hair. Sighing, Suiseiseki knew that she had lost at her own game. She carefully plucked the tiny Jun from atop her head and placed him in front of her again. Putting her hands on her hips, she began to congratulate him.

"Alright Jun, you win. I must say, I am very impressed. I honestly never expected a human as puny as you to actually succeed in my challenge!"

"Gee, thanks... Well, I won your game Suiseiseki. So, how about you tell me how you intend to return me to normal now?"


Suiseiseki simply stared at him for a moment. She had never expected for Jun to actually make it to the top of her head, and as such, she hadn't even planned this far ahead. What will she do now that Jun managed to win her game?
11211.title: Conquering Mt. Suiseiseki

choices: Hide in the closet!
Flee the bedroom!
112112.content:
The answer was flippin' obvious. She had plenty more tricks up her sleeve! LOTS of 'em! If little Miss Duely-Eyes can't back up her bogus claims, she'll just keep stalling until she could get away with it. Besides, she said by winning the game, Jun was one step closer to getting his size back. She didn't say how big a step! And when it regards someone like Suiseiseki, that step will ALWAYS be too big for Jun to reach!

"Hmph!" Suiseiseki tilted her head up and looked away. To Jun, this was never a good sign. "You're getting way ahead of yourself after winning just ONE game!"

"What are you talking about?" Jun asked the giant playful doll, "I won, now cough up the prize! My size!"

"Tsk!" the giant doll looked down at him and tsked, "...is that tiny brain of yours STILL too small for your puny body? Don't you remember me saying that was our 'FIRST game of the day'?"

Poor little puny tiny iddy biddy hopeless Jun gritted his teeth remembering that one little fact!

"Ugh... how many games am I gonna have to play?"

"That depends on big a jerk you're gonna be with me, yes?!" Suiseiseki crossed her arms and hmphed, "maybe if you spoke a little nicer, I'd consider only a few... dozen..." she muttered the last part under her breath.

"Alright alright," Jun sighed in defeat and embarrassment that a stupid doll was 1upping him, "what's the next game Suisei-"

"HOLD IT!" she cut him off, "who said you could call me that?!"

"W...What?"

"From now on, until the games are over, you are to address me as the Beautiful Maiden of Jade and Twilight, yes?!"

"Y-Y-You gotta be..." oh what's the use? She obviously wasn't kidding. She was gonna milk Jun like the tiny little clipped bull that he is (and it was gonna be a LONG while since bulls don't give milk!) Jun lowered his head and sighed, "Yes... Beautiful Maiden of Jade and Twilight."

Suiseiseki clapped her hands and smiled, "That's better! Now for your next trial... It's called 'Hide and Seek'. The rules are so simple even a stupid puny human like you can understand them, yes?"

"I know how to play Hide and Seek," Jun said.

"Good!" she replied, "then we'll add a few more rules to the game to make it more interesting, yes? Rule 1: You can only hide in this bedroom! You may NOT leave this room!"

Figures it wasn't gonna be that easy.

"Rule 2: You may NOT make contact with any of the other dolls! AT ALL!"

Jun shrugged. She's honestly telling him he cant get help. It was just HIM and the Beautiful Maiden of Jade and Twilight.

"Rule 3: No hiding in places that I cant reach!"

Ugh...

"And lastly, Rule 4: Don't even THINK about hiding under my dress!"

...WAIT, WHAT?! DID SHE JUST SAY?!

"I know how you make that perverted glance whenever you look at me!" Suiseiseki said, glaring down at Jun.

"You give yourself WAY too much credit," Jun whispered... thankfully, too quiet for the doll to hear!

"And If you break ANY of these rules..." Suiseiseki began as she waved her finger for a couple seconds before pausing to think. "Uh... um... I... I'll shrink your sister, too!"

Jun's eyes widened when he heard that threat!

"Y.... YOU WOULDN'T DARE!!"

"Oh I DO dare, yes?!" Suiseiseki continued her bluff, "And then... uh... when they come back, I'll shrink your parents, too!"

Jun gasped. That was a heck of a threat. If he was normal sized, he would take that threat very seriously and toss Suiseiseki in a wood chipper! Would she dare go far as to threaten his mom and dad as well?!

"But that's not all, yes?! I'll tell the others you and your family were gobbled up by evil space ninjas! They'll spend the rest of their lives crying and mourning your loss while I stuff you in a little mason jar and jump on the nearest plane leading to America! Then me and my tiny little puny pets will spend the rest of our lives touring Nickelback concerts!" Stars and stones, she spent quite a lot of time thinking about that, didn't she? Something's gotta go wrong, because she's feeling way too damn good!

Jun glared up at the duel-eyed wise-ass doll and bit the bullet. "Fine."

She smiled smugly, "Good! I'm gonna count to 10! Start hiding!" She turned around and covered her eyes. "1....2...."

Jun had to think quickly about where to hide. The closet, the bed, the closet, the drawer, the closet, the closet, behind the tv, and the closet. Looks like his choices were limited.

"3.....5... uh... wait..."

Then he turned his head to the door. The bottom of it had plenty of space to squeeze through...

"Um.... 5.... 7....4..."

Suiseiseki wasnt gonna help poor Jun out. He'd need somebody else. Preferably one of the OTHER girls!

"...7.....B, no wait."

Then again, he still remembers the threat she made. If she really isn't bluffing (fat chance), he'd only succeed in putting his family in jeopardy. They don't deserve to suffer just because HE didn't want to play nice with the doll from Hell!

".....7, ugh! I already said that! 2...."

Jun better think fast! Does he dare leave the safety of his room and risk a terrible fate? Or resume being Suiseiseki's little torture toy and risk a terrible fate as well?!
112112.title: She didnt make it this far by just shaking hands!

choices: Sets up a tea party for the two of them.
Decides to play a game with her new 'doll'.
Bumps into Suiseiseki on the way!
113.content:
As Jun looked up, he saw HinaIchigo looking down at him with a smile on her face. Before he could even move, Hina reached down and wrapped her fingers around his body, lifting him helplessly into the air. As his legs dangled below him, Jun was unable to move within Hina's grip. He could only stare in awe at how big the young doll was to him now. It was a complete role reversal, as he was now the size of a doll and being held in her hand. Looking at him closely, HinaIchigo's smile brightened.

"Wow! It's a little Jun doll! I wonder where you came from..."

'Crap! She thinks that I really am a doll!' Jun thought.

Jun quickly realized that he had to get HinaIchigo to realize his true identity, or else he would probably end up being forced to take part in some kind of tea party with her. If she thought that he was a doll, then there was no telling what she would do with him. Jun quickly yelled out to her.

"Hina! I'm not a doll! It's really me, Jun!"

"Uunyuu?"

"Listen Hina! I need you to help-"

Jun was cut off as HinaIchigo pulled him in for a tight hug.

"Oh wow! I found a talking Jun doll! This is so cool!"

'Great... HinaIchigo is just as oblivious to reality as ever... I suppose that I have no choice but to play along until I get a chance to find help.' Jun thought, feeling somewhat defeated.

"Alright little Jun, we're going to have so much fun together!"


HinaIchigo then runs up the stairs to Jun's room and...
113.title: Hina's new toy!

choices: "Take you up to your room so I can have some fun with you!"

114.content:
Jun stared up to see the face of Suigintou looming over him with a devious smile. He didn't trust her; even if she had made up with Shinku and the other dolls trusted Shinku's judgement, Jun was hesitant to trust the doll that had ruthlessly attacked him and the others in the past. It had been a full three months of her visiting his house regularly, and he still didn't feel safe around her. He was especially nervous now, seeing the deadly doll towering over him as if she were 50 feet tall!

Jun was terrified, and immediately turned to run. Luckily he hadn't shut the door before he shrunk, so he thought he could still escape. His path was cut off as a large black feather, that was just as big as he was, shot past him and lodged itself in the floor in front of him. Before he could even react, he found his body wrapped in the fingers of the silver-haired doll. As she lifted him up and placed him on the palm of her hand, Jun began to shiver in fear.

"Well, well, well... What have we here? I've come over to visit my good friends, but Little Jun seems to have gotten even smaller since I last came over!"

"P-please don't hurt me, Suigintou!"

Suigintou's face shifted to a hurt expression.

"Why Jun, how could you even suggest such a thing? You know that I've made up with the others! Maybe you need to be punished for accusing me of something like that!"

"No! Please, I'm sorry Suigintou! Don't kill me!"

Suigintou simply grinned.

"Oh don't worry Jun, I was only joking! You know that I'm not that doll anymore. I've changed, and I'm not gonna go back to being evil anytime soon."

"W-what are you gonna do with me?"

"Well, that's a good question... What will I do with you? I could always just give you to Shinku, but that wouldn't be any fun for me, would it? I might just want to play with you myself for a while..."

Jun simply gulped nervously as his captor decided what she would do with him.

"Alright Jun, I've decided. I'm gonna..."
114.title: A black-winged doll discovers a diminished Jun

choices: "Cat and mouse. How long you can escape from kitty, my cute little mousy."
"Hide and seek. I'll find you no matter where you hide, my sweet plaything."

1141.content:
A devious smirk spread across Suigintou's face as she began to speak.

"Alright Jun, I've decided. I'm gonna take you up to your room so I can have some fun with you!"

"What?! B-but I thought you said that you weren't evil anymore!"

"Just because I'm not evil anymore doesn't mean I can't still have fun toying with you, my adorable little plaything. I said I wouldn't hurt you, I never said I wouldn't use you for my own amusement."

"You can't do this to me! I'm not a toy, I'm a living breathing human being!"

"Come on, it's not going to be that bad. You worry too much, I'm sure that you'll come to enjoy spending time with me. Lots and lots of time." Suigintou said with a teasing giggle.

Jun tried to continue arguing, but before he could open his mouth to say a word, Suigintou pressed one of her fingers over his mouth to silence him. She then carried him up into his room and shut the door behind her.

As soon as she entered the room, Suigintou sat herself down on top of Jun's bed. She then crossed her legs and dropped the tiny Jun between them. Jun wanted to try and escape, but he quickly realized that Suigintou's legs made a massive wall surrounding him from all directions. Desperate to get away, he tried climbing up Suigintou's dress to get over her legs. Seeing this, Suigintou began to giggle to herself. For a time she allowed Jun to keep up his futile struggles, but as soon as he reached the top and was preparing to jump off of her leg to the other side, Suigintou carelessly poked him and sent him tumbling right back to where he started.

"I won't let you get away that easily, Jun. We're going to have so much fun together." Suigintou said, the same devious grin still fresh on her face.

"Please Suigintou, just leave me alone already! I just want to get back to normal size already!" Jun began to beg.

"Hmmm? But why would you want that when you can stay here and play with me all day?" Suigintou teased.

"Because I don't want to play with you! I just want to be normal again!"

"Awww... Don't be like that, Jun. I just want to have a little fun with you. Oh, and I know exactly what game we can play first! How about we play..."

11533.content:
Jun's face immediately lost all color as he stared in terror at the now-towering form of the evil doll Barasuishou. He didn't know how it was possible! He saw her lose control of the rosa mysticae energy shatter into pieces before his very eyes, yet somehow this devilish doll had returned! As she stood on his doorstep and glared at him, Jun began to quiver in fear. Jun knew full well what Barasuishou was capable of; she was the one who manipulated the others into starting the Alice Game in the first place, and if not for being unable to control the rosa mysticae, she would have won it too! Her cruel methods and heartless manipulation of the other dolls was a truly scary thing to watch, and her power was almost as great as Shinku herself!

While she had only vanquished Shinku due to a sneak attack, it was still a very close fight up until that point. In the moment of her defeat, Shinku was about to show mercy on her despite the evils she had committed. The results of this incident showed that Bara herself was one without mercy. Jun knew that being trapped in the hands of this porcelain demon would be the worst fate he could ever be forced to endure. He instantly turned tail and began to run, but Barasuishou saw through his attempt to escape from her. With a snap of her fingers, a large crystal shot out of the ground and blocked off Jun's only escape route! He was now completely trapped!

With a devilish smirk, Bara knelt down to get a closer look at her cowering captive. Seeing the small human boy shaking in fear of her, Barasuishou couldn't help but laugh. Reaching out toward him, she proceeded to give Jun a painful flick with her index finger that easily knocked him onto his back. Jun was stunned by the pain, and he was absolutely petrified by the thought of what this doll could do to him in his current state. She could have easily killed him at his normal size, and now he himself was as small as a doll to her! Relishing in the fear she saw on her prey's face, Barasuishou then pinned Jun's miniscule body down with only her index finger.

Letting out another laugh, Barasuishou began to speak.

"Ah, it's so good to finally be back again! I simply adore the feeling of power I get from dominating a pitiful little creature like you! So Jun, tell me... Did you miss me while I was gone?"

"H-how are you-"

Barasuishou cut Jun off there.

"How am I alive, you ask? It's quite simple really. Enju wanted revenge on you for causing my destruction, so he rebuilt me and sent me to have some fun with you!"

"B-but didn't he-"

Interrupting him again, Barasuishou continued speaking.

"Yes, he did disappear when I was defeated, but he didn't die. Father was simply sealed into a bizarre N-field. He's floating around in eternal nothingness, and it's all your fault!"

Being accused of causing the fate that that Rozen wannabe brought upon himself infuriated Jun.

"What?! But I didn't seal him away! It's his fault for trying to outdo Rozen in the first place! You can't do this to me! Let me go right now!"

Barasuishou was ticked off as she heard Jun insulting her creator, and she instantly snatched him off the ground and clenched him within her fist. She proceeded to squeeze him tightly, wanting to hear him apologize to her and beg for mercy. When she saw that he was still being stubborn, Barasuishou increased the pressure she was putting on him. Jun immediately screamed out in agony as his body was being crushed in the devilish doll's mighty grip. Barasuishou simply laughed once again.

"I don't think that you're in much of a position to be making demands, pathetic human! Now that my shrinking powder has reduced you to such a laughable size, you won't ever be able to escape from my wrath! You belong to me from now on, and I'm going to have a lot of fun torturing you!"

Jun simply couldn't contain his fear. His face was as pale as a sheet, and he was shaking like a leaf. This doll was the source of his shrinking, and now he was utterly helpless in her hands. He was completely at her mercy, and she had long ago proven that she had no mercy to offer. He knew that he was doomed if he couldn't get help, and with the last of his breath, Jun called out desperately for Shinku. Hearing his desperate cry, Barasuishou squeezed him once again, constricting his body with her powerful fingers and preventing him from breathing. With the lack of air, Jun quickly slipped into merciful unconsciousness.

His only hope was that Shinku had heard him. As Jun blacked out, he could only pray that she had. Several hours later, Jun wakes up in...

Jun awoke with a cough, why was there so much dust?

"About time you woke up, pest. I was just about to snap off one of your puny limbs to shock you awake myself." a voice said coldly, causing him to turn to it's source. 

Towering over him was a young-looking girl wearing an ornately ruffled collar with a small, dark purple rose on it that covered the puffy part of the sleeves, a lavender dress with a wrap-around top, puffy sleeves at the shoulders and wide long sleeves, with two crystals dangling from the puffy parts. The skirt was below knee-length and had two layers, the top layer was lavender and joined to the top, the bottom was light pink,which obscure the top of a pair of high, purple, laced-up boots. On her head were two matching rosebuds as the one on her collar, each accompanied by three crystals that tied a few strands of her hair back slightly. Her slightly wavy hair was long and white, and her one visible eye was yellow, as she wore a purple rose-adorned eyepatch over her left eye.

Barasuishou.

Damnit. It hadn't been a dream! 

Barasuishou smirked at him cruelly.

"Just so you know... No one knows you're here."

Looking around, the false Maiden picked up a brick and  tossed it from one hand to the other casually.

"This abandoned warehouse'll make a wonderful torture chamber."

Jun paled at that before scrambling away as she slammed the brick down right next to him.

Barasuishou laughed, enjoying his fear and feeling drunk off power. Wanting to enjoy herself more, she grabbed Jun and set the brick on his legs to ensure he couldn't flee before stopping to think.

Making up her mind, Enju's depraved brainchild then...

His pull-string!
1153311.content:
Jun's blood ran cold as the damned doll casually stepped toward the darkened corner of the warehouse like she already planned out in full detail her 'fun' with him. Just hearing her slow footsteps was unbearable to him. She could easily just float over to the corner of the room, but instead she walked at a casual calming pace. It was like she wanted to take her time with it, just to make Jun sweat over it. Well, he was sweating. He should've pissed himself while he was at it, cuz what was awaiting him was something Jun wouldn't wish on his worst enemy!

"Jun?" he heard Barasuishou call out to him in an unfittingly calm voice, "may I ask you a quick question?"

"Wh...what?" Jun asked.

"Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a doll yourself?"
'What kind of question is that?' Jun wondered. But since he didn't wanna test her when he's in such a vulnerable state, he answered, "I... I guess...?"

"I'm glad you've gotten curious," she called out, "very glad. To be honest, ever since I first met you, I wondered what kind of doll you'd make. I personally think you would have made a great plain doll. Not a wacky super-hero action figure doll or a little girl's doll with a fake plasticy smile. A plain normal boy doll... just like every other real boy." Jun wasn't in any mood to listen to Barasuishou's little rant, however something told him he needed to pay close attention to it! "You wouldn't be a doll that does tricks like a kung-fu grip or shoot fireballs or anything spontaneous. You would just be a normal old fashioned little boy doll... like one of those classic ones back in it's prime... before there was a need to be extreme or do silly tricks to attract attention."

"Wh... what exactly are you going on about?" Jun got really sick of the commentary and wished she'd just get to the point! He could hear a bit of rustling around in the dark, followed by the sound of metal clanking.

"Haven't you figured it out yet?" Barasuishou quietly spoke, "obviously, you wouldn't be one of the SMARTER dolls. But that's fine. A plain average doll would fit you perfectly."
"For the last time, weed-eye, what the heck are you planning?!" Jun finally mustered the courage to raise his voice. He would then come to regret that.
After hearing a faint giggle, he heard her voice continue, "I'm going to prove myself right. I'm going to make you a doll."

The poor boy paled as she finally stepped out of the darkness, carry two new toys. One of them being a black suitcase that seemed to be designed for someone her size to carry. The other being a little doll mask.
Her rose blossomed with as much tenacity as her yellow eye as she gazed down at Jun... then to her little doll mask.
"Look, Jun," she brought it to his face... the mask looked exactly, EXACTLY like his own! Carved perfectly well... right down to the way his eyebrows tilt and his lips sink downward in such a sad expression, "it's a perfect match. It took me so long to carve this to match your face, but I think I did a spectacular job! Don't you?"

He shivered and sweated. How Barasuishou managed to have the time, patience, and talent to carve out a doll face to match his own exactly in his particular size is a mystery he'd way rather not solve!

"Father would be so proud of me, don't you think?" she didn't give him any time to answer as she opened up the suitcase, revealing a plethora of surgical tools, hammers, nails, screws, etc."He'd also be proud of the way I paid back an enemy of his."
"W-W-W-WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?!!"
"I'm going to make my doll, Jun." Barasuishou pulled out a syringe, "My very first doll, made all by myself, for nobody to play with but me!"

Jun didn't even get to finish his horrified scream before the mad one-eyed doll injected her 'medicine' into his neck! Barely seconds later, Jun's voice fell flat. He remained awake and aware, but he couldn't move an inch of his body. All the feeling in him that wasn't emotional was gone. He was practically lifeless... like a doll.
He stared blankly into space, barely able to roll his eyes, but he could still see quite clearly what was happening. Barasuishou made sure that whatever the hell that was she injected him with didn't give him the luxury of putting him to sleep. He was gonna see it the whole way through!

Now that the doll mask was on, Barasuishou had to make sure it'd STAY on.

He could see her disturbed smile light up the room as she placed the sad Jun doll mask over his face and got to work. He stared when she pulled out a nice little hammer and a couple of nails and the next thing he knew-

*KINK! KINK! KINK! KINK!*

Hard heavy clanking that shook his head a bit as a nail was being pounded into the side of his skull. All this time, Jun was screaming for help in his mind. He wanted to scream, he wanted to curse, he wanted to pray, he wanted to go home, but Barasuishou denied him of all of that. He could only listen to the nail penetrate deeper into his head and at the very least be thankful he couldn't scream.

The clanking from the side of his head had stopped, but only for his doll captor to turn his head and work on the other side!

*KINK! KINK! KINK!*
The noise would probably haunt his nightmares at this rate. He couldn't so much as feel the tears dripping out. The sad expression on his doll face matched what he was feeling perfectly. By the time his torturer is done with him, he'd probably never want to smile again at this rate.

The pounding had finally ended. The doll face now a part of him.
Barasuishou admired her work as she stared at it with a sadistic smile, "Perfect! Just perfect! Now what part of you should I start on next?"
